pages.text: Dinosaurs can carry diseases and, obviously, can injure you and other animals. You'll have to tread carefully to avoid these ailments:$(br2)$(l)Bleeding $(br)Avian Influenza (H0) $(br)Bug Bites

You can begin $(l)Bleeding$() as a result of being attacked by certain dinosaurs. This can be life-threatening, especially in higher blood loss levels. Sprinting will make it worse, so you should try to stop and rest to wait for the bleeding to stop.
